attributes.action: The creation of a safe cycle route from Meare to Glastonbury in Somerset
attributes.background: Inject funds into creating a safe cycle way along the very busy and dangerous stretch of road that exists from Meare to Glastonbury.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
